strings.Value: "Knew all my life that trolls fear fire. One more thing that's changed."
"Don't worry on that account — we always can resort to acid. We just have to make sure we keep enough among our supplies."

"I wonder how will this influence their culture... Will they begin cooking on open fires? Or gather around the bonfire to sit and chat in the evening, like we do? I've a scientist friend who'd be thrilled at such questions!"
"Almost invincible... They know no pity, need no food — until there are enough enemy corpses around... Such warriors are priceless."
"Only one who carries fire inside them can truly learn not to fear it. And as for trolls... We just need more fire, that's all."
"Only one who carries fire inside them can truly learn not to fear it. And as for trolls... We just need more fire, that's all."
